definition.text: Superalgos is a very elaborate trading toolkit

paragraphs.text: There are a lot of concepts to learn before you can start to use SuperAlgos. The toolkit is very flexible, but this flexibility comes at a price: a steep learning curve.
There is still quite a bit of work to do on the platform and users are expected to contribute to the project to make sure it moves forward.
I am still learning the platform (not completely done with the tutorials yet), but there are already a few improvements I have identified in the UI that would help improve the user experience:
Back button for the docs tab
Browser hardware acceleration support for linux users
Better/easier/faster way to navigate through the design view

It is also my understanding that SA is a low frequency trading platform and that the granularity is about 75 seconds. Not sure how this will turn out to be a limitation in the future. Might be nice to have the ability to access (almost) real time information for certain strategies
